name: UnitySpace
description:
This game was created as a project for MART 380: New Media, a class offered through the Media Arts program at the University of South Carolina.

The goal of this project is to create an environment that the player can experience and, through that experience, learn something about the creator. For my project, I wanted to build a space that allows the player to be alone and explore. For me, being alone in the woods is both relaxing and terrifying. There's the uncertainty of what might be waiting for me, but there's also the familiarity of the sound of birds or the wind blowing through the trees. You're left alone with just your thoughts, and sometimes that can feel more threatening than any creature you might encounter.
